articles.author: Haresh Menghani
articles.title: Japanese Yen sticks to BoJ-inspired losses; USD/JPY stands tall near multi-day peak - FXStreet
articles.description: The Japanese Yen (JPY) ticks higher during the Asian session on Tuesday and for now, seems to have snapped a two-day losing streak against its American counterpart.
articles.content:
• The Japanese weakens across the board after the BoJ announced its policy decision. 
  • The BoJ keeps the short-term rate target at -0.1% and the 10-year JGB yield target at 0%.
  • B… [+8346 chars]
